title: Reverse? Brady backs Kraft, 'get that 7th ring'

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: Reverse? Brady backs Kraft, 'get that 7th ring'
sources.description: Tom Brady, who was widely criticized this week after he said he didn't have a "dog in the fight" in Sunday's Super Bowl between the Patriots and Seahawks, indicated in a social media post Friday night that he is backing his former team.
